original_text: And though she spoke to Joseph day after day, he refused to go to bed with her or even be with her.
korean_text: 여인이 날마다 요셉에게 청하였으나 요셉이 듣지 아니하여 동침하지 아니할 뿐더러 함께 있지도 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: And though she spoke to Joseph
he refused to go to bed with her

sentences.korean_translation: 심지어 그녀와 함께 있는 것조차 거절했습니다
